metadata.title: CVE-2016-1973 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Race condition in the GetStaticInstance function in the WebRTCimplementation in Mozilla Firefox before 45.0 might allow remote attackersto execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (use-after-free) viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1973` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 45.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 45.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 45.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 45.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '45.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
